header.title: Modern Music Player
header.subtitle: Desktop Application
header.available: Available for Windows, Mac y Linux

mainFeatures.title: Explore and discover all the features that

feature1.title: Play all your music
feature1.description: Discover different ways to play your favorite music easily and simply

feature2.title: All your playlists in one place
feature2.description: View all your playlists, edit them as you wish in an orderly and simple way

feature3.title: Organize your music as you like it
feature3.description: Organize your music the way you like it and always have it at hand

footer.title: Let's go, give it a try

options.title: Resources
options.issues: Report Issues or Propose New Features

description.1: Change the playback mode to thumbnail player (Picture in Picture, pip mode, shortcut key 'P'), to show you all the playlists on the main screen
description.2: If you press the 'Home' button again, you will see the music playing again

description.1: Opens the option to add an entire folder of songs, and adds them as a single playlist
description.2: You can also use the shortcut key 'O'

description.1: Create a new playlist section, where you can create new playlists and thus keep your playlists organized
Displays the name of the section where it contains all the playlists
description.2: If you double click, you can change the name of the section, confirm the new name with the 'Enter' key, but if you press 'Esc' or remove the focus, the editing mode will be cancelled.
description.3: Also when you position yourself on the name of the section, the '+' button will appear to create a new playlist in that section
description.4: Finally, if you position it in the upper left corner, the option to delete the section will appear, all the playlists in that section will be deleted and also the section, but if the section contains the playlist 'All Songs' it will not be deleted the section, but if the rest of the playlists in that section were emptied

description.1: View all playlists in a specific section
description.2: You can hold down the left click and drag the playlist to rearrange them

description.1: Default playlist, cannot be deleted
description.2: Additionally, when you add a new song with 'Open with' from the system file explorer or by dragging and dropping a song into the main player, it will be added to this playlist

description.1: If you hover over a playlist, the Play Playlist button will appear, if the playlist is already playing, the Pause Playlist button will appear.
description.2: If you left click on the playlist, it will display all the songs that are in the list, if you click again it will hide the songs
description.3: Additionally, when you position the mouse over the upper left corner, the option to delete the playlist will appear (if the playlist is 'All Songs' it will not be deleted, but it will empty all the songs in the playlist)
description.4: Finally, if you position the mouse in the lower left corner, the option to change the name of the playlist will appear. The new name is confirmed with the 'Enter' key, but if you press 'Esc' or remove the focus it will be cancelled. editing mode

description.1: You can add one or more songs from our system file explorer by dragging and dropping songs into the playlist
description.2: Additionally, you can add one or more new playlists to a specific section by dragging and dropping one or more song folders into the desired section.

description.1: Play the selected song
description.2: You can also change the playback mode to miniature player (Picture in Picture, pip mode, shortcut key 'P'), to show you all the playlists on the main screen
description.3: You can also change the playback mode to full screen player, to view the song in full screen or you can use the shortcut key 'F'

description.1: When viewing a playlist in detail on the main screen, with the back button you return to the main screen of all playlists
Add a new playlist section, where you can create new playlists and thus keep your playlists organized
Displays the name of the section where it contains all the playlists
description.2: If you double click, you can change the name of the section, confirm the new name with the 'Enter' key, but if you press 'Esc' or remove the focus, the editing mode will be cancelled
description.3: Also when you hover over the section name, the '+' button will appear to create a new playlist in that section
description.4: Finally, if you position it in the upper left corner, the option to delete the section will appear, all the playlists in that section will be deleted and also the section, but if the section contains the playlist 'All Songs' it will not be deleted the section, but if the rest of the playlists in that section were emptied

description.1: View all playlists in a specific section and view them section by section
description.2: If you hover over a playlist, the Play Playlist button will appear, if the playlist is already playing, the Pause Playlist button will appear
description.3: You can also position yourself in the upper left corner of a playlist and the option to delete the playlist will appear (if the playlist is 'All Songs' it will not be deleted, but it will empty all the songs in the playlist)
description.4: Finally, if you left click on a playlist, you will enter the mode to view the songs in the playlist in detail mode

description.1: View the playlist in detail
description.2: Displays the play playlist button, if the playlist is already playing, the pause playlist button will appear
description.3: Displays the delete playlist button, if the playlist is 'All Songs' it will not be deleted, but it will empty all the songs in the playlist
description.4: Display the 'Search songs' field to search for a specific song in the current list

description.1: If you left click on the name of the playlist, it will open a modal to edit the Playlist
description.2: You can edit the name of the Playlist in the 'Title' field
description.3: You can change the image of the Playlist in the 'Image' field, if you leave the field empty you will be able to view all the default images available
description.4: In addition to changing the image with the available options, you can copy and paste the url of an image from the PC or the internet
description.5: Another way to change the image is by left clicking on the current image, a modal will open to select an image from the PC
description.6: You can also edit the color of the Playlist in the 'Color' field, by clicking on the current color, you will be able to view all the available colors
description.7: You can edit the section to which the Playlist belongs in the 'Section' field, by clicking on the current section, you will be able to view all the available sections
description.8: Finally you can save the changes with the 'Save' button or cancel the changes by pressing the 'Esc' key or by clicking outside the modal
description.9: As a final detail, with each change you can see how the Playlist would look, but if you cancel the changes, it will return to its original values

description.1: View all songs in a playlist
description.2: Additionally, you can see if a song is already playing, it will turn green
description.3: You can play a song by double clicking on the song
description.4: You can also play a song by positioning the mouse over the song number and the play the song button will appear, but if the song is already playing the pause the song button will appear
description.5: Finally you can delete a song by clicking on the trash icon

description.1: Holding down the left click on a song will put it into drag and drop mode so you can rearrange the song in the playlist
description.2: If you left click on a song, the song will be selected and if you left click again the song will be deselected
description.3: You can select a song and then select another song by holding down the 'Shift' key, and this will select all the songs between the two selected songs
description.4: You can also select a song and then select another song by holding down the 'Ctrl' key, and this will select the two selected songs
description.5: Finally, with the songs selected you can rearrange them by pressing left click to drag them to the desired position

description.1: You can add one or more songs from our system file explorer by dragging and dropping songs into the playlist
description.2: You can also choose in which position the songs will be added

description.1: Change the app view mode to dark mode or light mode
Change the language of the application to Spanish or English
description.2: Additionally, if the language is changed, the selected language will be saved for the next time the application is opened
description.3: Finally, new languages can be implemented in the future

description.1: Import your favorite playlists from your favorite music app
description.2: Import from YouTube, when you click on the 'Import YouTube' button, a new window will open in your browser to request read-only permissions for your YouTube playlists
description.3: When you import your YouTube playlists, a new section named 'YouTube' will be created and all your YouTube playlists will be added
description.4: For now only YouTube is available, but new music applications may be implemented in the future

description.1: View the song currently playing
description.2: You can also click on the name of the song and the current playlist of the song will open
description.3: If you click on the song name again, it will center the song in the playlist

description.1: Play the selected song
description.2: You can also pause the selected song
description.3: You can also fast forward the selected song
description.4: You can also rewind the selected song
description.5: You can press the option to shuffle all the songs in the playlist
description.6: You can press the repeat option, where it will alternate between the options of repeating the current song, repeating the current playlist or not repeating anything
description.7: You can also use the shortcut keys 'Space' to play or pause the song, 'Right arrow' to fast forward the song, 'Left arrow' to rewind the song, 'A' to play in shuffle mode, 'R' to change the repeat mode
description.8: You can also jump to different sections of the song with the keys 0 to 9, where 0 is the start of the song and 9 is 90% of the song
description.9: Finally you can use the multimedia keys on your keyboard to control the playback of the song e.g. 'Play/Pause', 'Stop', 'Previous', 'Next'

description.1: Control the volume of the selected song
description.2: You can also use the shortcut keys 'Up Arrow' to increase the volume and 'Down Arrow' to decrease the volume
description.3: You can also use the multimedia keys on your keyboard to control the volume of the song, e.g. 'Volume +', 'Volume -'
description.4: Finally you can click on the speaker icon to mute the song or use the 'M' shortcut key

description.1: View all keyboard shortcuts available in the application
description.2: You can also hide keyboard shortcuts with the 'Esc' key or by clicking outside the modal

description.1: Change the playback speed of the selected song
description.2: You can change the playback speed of the selected song with the shortcut keys '+' to increase the speed and '-' to decrease the speed

description.1: Change the playback mode to thumbnail player (Picture in Picture, pip mode, shortcut key 'P'), to show you all the playlists on the main screen
description.2: You can also manipulate the thumbnail player independently of the main application

description.1: In normal playback mode, you can change the playback mode to theater mode, to view the song almost in full screen, without displaying the playlists or playback controls
Export current application settings
description.2: When exporting the configuration, a json file with the current application configuration will be downloaded
description.3: It will also include playlists and songs in playlists

description.1: Import application settings
description.2: When importing the configuration, a modal will open to select the json file with the application configuration
description.3: Importing settings will overwrite the current application settings
description.4: It will also overwrite playlists and songs in playlists

description.1: Update the application to the latest available version
description.2: When you update the app, the latest available version will be downloaded and installed automatically
